Name: Spinach
Description: He's strong to the finish because he eats his spinach!

DescriptionLocalization.es: ¡El es fuerte hasta el final porque se come las espinacas!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Il est fort comme un bœuf car il mange ses épinards !
DescriptionLocalization.ja: いつもホウレンソウを食べているから、彼のフィニッシュは強烈だ！
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Ele é forte até o final porque come seu espinafre!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Он силен до конца, потому что ест шпинат!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: O sonuna kadar güçlü çünkü ıspanağını yiyor!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 他很强壮，因为他吃了他的菠菜！
